ActionInputs.description: This type is required by ts-json-schema so we can generate proper

Actions.description: Actions that can be sent to the server via the server API #call function. The value follows a special namespacing format. Before the first _ is the functions/src/actions/ filename that will have its #run method be executed. After that, the rest is action-specific. For example, game actions are of the form "GameAction_{gameId}_{methodName}".

flush.description: Flushes the domains of the user.
